attributes.title: The WORST app EVER
attributes.review: This app was so horrid! As soon as I opened it, the terrible stench from FAILURE to run a country almost KILLED ME. Also, the app made my phone glitch so bad and gave me a virus. Now I have to get a new phone. I DO NOT recommend this app at ALL because of the amount of bugs in the game.

attributes.title: What the heck
attributes.review: So apparently this app is just allowed to use your location whenever, including when it’s not open. Which can deplete battery life and doesn’t at all make me feel safe.

attributes.title: This app is awful
attributes.review: As soon as I download this app I could hear Harambe shaming me for my actions. Harambe said to me “my follower how could you sin like this. I am love but you have caused hate.” After he told that to me I deleted the app and had to pray to Harambe for 6 months to regain his holy trust.

attributes.title: This app made me go blind 🤮

attributes.title: Dump Trump
attributes.review: With America at such a horrible point over something the like race our president had done nothing to deal with the political unrest except fuel it by referring to people who want justice “thugs”. America, we’ve got a problem and it’s time for change.
